item.title: This website
item.description: I finallly “finished” my website I dont think I will ever truly finish it, as even with this setup right now I am immideatly thinking about making a custom static page generator The Idea I always really liked the idea of having a website/blog where I can post my own stuff, while not being limited by lenght like on twitter, but also by being more open than a private discord server.
